entry.title: Katex Test
entry.content:
Introduction

This document contains my notes and understanding of cryptographic concepts.

Mathematical Foundations

Modular Arithmetic

Euler’s theorem states that:

\[a^{\phi(n)} \equiv 1 \pmod n\]

where \(\phi(n)\) is the Euler totient function.

Elliptic Curves

An elliptic curve over a field \(\mathbb{F}_p\) is defined by:

\[y^2 = x^3 + ax + b\]

Test \(\phi\) and

\[123\]

Zero-Knowledge Proofs

A zero-knowledge proof allows one party to prove knowledge of a secret without revealing it.
